reviewText: I love the characters and Norman Price, especially!!  I can always use Norman to teach my grandchildren a lesson about not listening to grownups!!
Title: Fireman Sam: Brave New Rescues

reviewText: "Fireman Sam:  Brave New Rescues" is a great DVD for both boys and girls.  It not only teaches safety and teamwork but it includes firemen which my boys love!  Fireman Sam is also the only show I can think of that features firemen and it also is a show that we always seem to miss on tv.  There are six episodes total on the DVD and it definitely occupies my boys, maybe too much since they want to watch it over and over again!  The DVD is kid-friendly and for ages 2 and up.  Oh and the animation is very bright and well-animated.Episodes:Cry WolfBlow Me DownDily's Big SurpriseModel PlaneOpen DayMike's Rocket
Title: Fireman Sam: Brave New Rescues

reviewText: The first thing my grandson asks for when he comes over is to watch "Fireman Sam." Loves the adventures and can relate to the kids in the stories
Title: Fireman Sam: Brave New Rescues

reviewText: Fireman Sam! The boys around here LOVE Fireman Sam. They sit glued watching all the adventure he has to offer them :)
Title: Fireman Sam: Brave New Rescues

reviewText: It's really got some great lessons.  The animation is first rate.  It is also international.  I highly recommend it.  Your kids will enjoy it and so will you.
Title: Fireman Sam: Brave New Rescues

reviewText: Did not know this existed till four year old grandson tore fit  till we watched it thank you fireman sam
Title: Fireman Sam: Brave New Rescues

reviewText: My grandsons, ages 3 - 11, loved it! I babysat them for several hours and with several of Fireman Sam episodes available, they were entertained the entire time.
